description: Physical servers status based on glances data

targets.query: SELECT mean("cpucore") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("min1") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min5") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min15") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "$host.processcount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("rx")/mean("time_since_update")*8 FROM "network" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/) AND ("interface_name" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("tx")/mean("time_since_update")*-8 FROM "network" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/) AND ("interface_name" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("/.used") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.size") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.percent") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("percent") FROM "fs" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/) AND ("mnt_point" = '/boot') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("read_bytes")/mean("time_since_update") FROM "diskio" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/) AND  ("disk_name" =~ /^$disk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("write_bytes")/mean("time_since_update") FROM "diskio" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/) AND  ("disk_name" =~ /^$disk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("cpu_percent") FROM "$host.docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("cpu_percent") FROM "$host.docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

title: Servers Status
